channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: India’s digital payments strategy is cutting out Visa and Mastercard
item.description: As digital payments morph into strategic assets, India is offering a template for other nations seeking to reduce dependence on Western payment networ...

item.title: How Wildfire Smoke Affects Your Health—And How to Protect Yourself
item.description: Exposure to smoke is dangerous regardless of your health status—so follow these steps to limit the risk.

item.title: Automattic says it will reduce its contribution to WordPress core project to match WP Engine
item.description: It’s a new year, but drama in the WordPress community keeps going. Automattic, the company that runs WordPress.com, said that it would reduce its cont...

item.title: Beams secures $9M Series A to digitize UK home renovation market
item.description: Home renovation projects can be unpredictable for both customers and builders. Meanwhile, small contractors barely use modern software and home renova...

item.title: Can Your Car Be Your Friend?
item.description: Automakers are showing off whizz-bang tech for vehicle interiors meant to reshape drivers’ relationships with their cars.

item.title: Gumloop, founded in a bedroom in Vancouver, lets users automate tasks with drag-and-drop modules
item.description: Developers Max Brodeur-Urbas and Rahul Behal think that AI has the potential to automate lots of business-relevant tasks, but that many of the AI-powe...

item.title: The Government Wants to Protect Robux From Hackers
item.description: In a new proposal issued Friday, the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau is seeking to regulate virtual currencies used in Roblox and other video gam...

item.title: Cannabis company Stiiizy says hackers accessed customers’ ID documents
item.description: A ransomware gang took credit for the breach, claiming to have stolen over 400,000 government-issued identity documents from customers. © 2024 TechCru...

item.title: 9 Best Mobile Game Controllers (2025): iPhone or Android
item.description: Touchscreens don’t always get the job done. Try one of these WIRED-tested controllers for your iPhone or Android instead.

item.title: TikTok SCOTUS Live Blog: The Court Hears Arguments Over Potential Ban
item.description: We're tuning in live as the justices consider what could be one of the most consequential First Amendment cases of the past several decades.
